The question asks how long the cat wears the muzzle before the nail trimming starts. Since the video shows the person holding the muzzle and not placing it on the cat, it suggests that the muzzle has not been worn by the cat at this point. Therefore, the cat has not worn the muzzle for any of the given time options.

The dense caption confirms that the muzzle is placed on the cat to prevent biting during nail trimming. The video shows the muzzle being secured on the cat's head, suggesting that the cat starts wearing the muzzle right before the nail trimming begins. Given the options, the cat wears the muzzle for a very short duration before the nail trimming starts, which aligns with Option B (2 seconds).
</think>
